channel.title: Jagex-like RSC
channel.description:
Elite Gaming is a group of people who run servers for games such as World of Warcraft and Runescape and soon to come Counter-Strike: Source. Anyways about the RSC server, we started hosting it because our staff at Elite Gaming use to play way back before RS2.
First group of people that join ill give you free stats and what not to get the economy going. And if you wanna PK ill give you the gear, pots, food ect.
It's not a big server, and we don't plan on being a big server as it's completely Jagex-like. But if it does happen to bring lots of people we have a dedicated host to support them.
If you feel like joining, please visit the url in my signature.
[b][u]We are also looking for mods.[/u][/b]

item.title: Jagex-like RSC
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:25, topic:327411”][quote author=Mental Piracy link=topic=423800.msg3123388#msg3123388 date=1265774122]

Stock RSCD won’t hold 700 players for long. RSCA server has had many performance related updates. And I might just go and host a wow private server, I’ll report back if it holds 1.2k+ players. I suspect it will though (stock). But my main point was that RSCD servers are easily stable with a low player count, being a RSCD related topic and all…

I know about rsca’s updates you newbface. Stock RSCD would crash long before 700, i was merely pointing out you cannot compare a WoW server to an rsc server, now if you want to run something different bring back HRO, fuck WoW
[/quote]
You are the one comparing a WoW server to an RSC server…[/quote]
in no way did i compare them, All i did was point out the invalidity of the OP using WoW as a base for his RSC exploits.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex-like RSC
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:18, topic:327411”][quote author=EmuX link=topic=423800.msg3116838#msg3116838 date=1265068981]

[quote author=KO9 link=topic=423800.msg3116808#msg3116808 date=1265066666]

Good server, could use some updates such as theiving but other then that is very stable, just need some more players
[/quote]stability is easy when you have few players
[/quote][quote author=KO9 link=topic=423800.msg3116808#msg3116808 date=1265066666]

Good server, could use some updates such as theiving but other then that is very stable, just need some more players
[/quote]stability is easy when you have few players

Lol you know nothing about being stable. Try hosting 1200 players on a WoW server, then come talk.

Rsc != WoW, stability is stability whether its 1200 people or 700 people(which rsca has proven capable of holding). To compare the 2 is absurd. If i recall correctly you posted advertising this a while ago with it just being stock RSCD, in which case the stability is due to reines prowess and not your own ability, running a server that is already stable in no way denotes your ability to maintain or add onto it. Try again when you actually have something to bring to the table other than leeched RSCD and shit talking about a WoW p server.[/quote]
Stock RSCD won’t hold 700 players for long. RSCA server has had many performance related updates. And I might just go and host a wow private server, I’ll report back if it holds 1.2k+ players. I suspect it will though (stock). But my main point was that RSCD servers are easily stable with a low player count, being a RSCD related topic and all…

Read full topic

First group of people that join ill give you free stats and what not to get the economy going. And if you wanna PK ill give you the gear, pots, food ect.

It’s not a big server, and we don’t plan on being a big server as it’s completely Jagex-like. But if it does happen to bring lots of people we have a dedicated host to support them.

If you feel like joining, please visit the url in my signature.

We are also looking for mods.[/quote]

RSC like jagex

Good server, could use some updates such as theiving but other then that is very stable, just need some more players
[/quote]stability is easy when you have few players

Good server, could use some updates such as theiving but other then that is very stable, just need some more players
[/quote]stability is easy when you have few players

Lol you know nothing about being stable. Try hosting 1200 players on a WoW server, then come talk.

Who cares move the the RSC section and start talkin about wOw server and brag about how much you failed while doin so will not help.

Rsc != WoW, stability is stability whether its 1200 people or 700 people(which rsca has proven capable of holding). To compare the 2 is absurd. If i recall correctly you posted advertising this a while ago with it just being stock RSCD, in which case the stability is due to reines prowess and not your own ability, running a server that is already stable in no way denotes your ability to maintain or add onto it. Try again when you actually have something to bring to the table other than leeched RSCD and shit talking about a WoW p server.

item.description:

[quote=“Officer-Ahole, post:13, topic:327411”][quote author=adu link=topic=423800.msg3116864#msg3116864 date=1265070465]

[quote author=EmuX link=topic=423800.msg3116857#msg3116857 date=1265070181]

And WoW servers are the same as RSC right?

Then dont talk about stability of WoW vs RSC when there nothing alike, I bet wow servers are coded in a different language anyways.

you dont even know yourself. all you’re doing is assuming.[/quote]

QUOTE MANY ALOT BUNCH =D
